title: Bikram and Vitthal
description: A ghastly creature at large in a peaceful hill station, a multi-millionaire'â€™smurder mystery goes unsolved, a man with a harrowed childhood and asuccessful author unwillingly involved in a drama that might give him, his bestnovel so far, All these events happen in different timelines and cities, and yetare connected to each other like the universe's own conspiracy. It is amodern-day re-telling of classic Indian folklore of Vikram and Vetal, with atwist.
author: Kanika Sharma
